About us!

We were the first Pet Boutique to open up in the local community of Brighton. As an independent, family owned business, we have a passion for animals.
Starting in 1946, the business began with Mr Hillsden. His business partner, Mr Woof dedicated himself to the trade. As a dog, he could not contribute much in the field of business operations, but he nonetheless kept Mr Hillsden great company. After all, dogs may not make great business partners, but do give great company.

Come find us!
